channel.title: How would you invoke noclip without a command?
channel.description:
Hey everyone. Usually I can figure things out myself, but this time I'm stumped. How can you make someone noclip, without them having to type a command? The command is clientside, so thats why I couldn't figure it out. I tried "command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip");" No such luck.
Even if you can't help me on this, post here and say what you think.

item.title: How would you invoke noclip without a command?
item.dc:creator: @The_Guardian The Guardian
item.description:
@The_Guardian wrote:

If its possible, how do you do it?

Read full topic
item.source: How would you invoke noclip without a command?

item.title: How would you invoke noclip without a command?
item.dc:creator: @The_Guardian The Guardian
item.description:
@The_Guardian wrote:

Hey everyone. Usually I can figure things out myself, but this time I’m stumped. How can you make someone noclip, without them having to type a command? The command is clientside, so thats why I couldn’t figure it out. I tried “command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”);”
No such luck.

Even if you can’t help me on this, post here and say what you think.

Read full topic
item.source: How would you invoke noclip without a command?
